April 18, 1976 D Pontins Southport (Championship Section)
Pontins Southport (Championship Section) 0 Test Piece Contest Pontins (Southport) - Qualifiers pontins-southport-championship-section Pontins (Championship Section)
Test Piece Contest
Holiday Overture for Brass
Pontins Holiday Centre (Ballroom), Ainsdale Beach, Southport Prizes £500, £200, £100. Programme shows two championship section contests held on 18th and 19th April, 7 bands competed on Sunday 18th, 3 bands competed Monday 19th.
